TextView.android:text: A favorite around here. A half pound patty with cheddar cheese, smoky bacon, golden onion rings, lettuce, tomato and somethered in our Sweet Hickory Sauce

If you want a burger that flirts with the wild side, you have found it! Start with our signature half pound patty and stack it with grilled pastrami, wrapped tightly around a 4 ounce portion of slow smoked pulled pork, crispy bacon, lettuce, pickle, tomato, onion, swiss and placed carefully between buns grilled with golden honey and mustard. You will not soon forget your date with the badger!
